item.title: Streamdeck Installation on Linux
item.description: Nowadays streaming is a widely practiced hobby. Gaming, e-sports, etc… are all things that aid to the popularity of streaming as a whole. A lot of people dream about streaming content for a living and for that you need to have a setup that enables you to do a lot of different stuff on stream, there comes the Streamdeck into play. The Streamdeck is actually a buttonbox that you can program with all kinds of functionality to enhance your streams or even you worklife.

item.title: This blog costs less then 10$ per year
item.description: Yes, it is possible. You can run a website for virtually no money thanks to a couple of software and services. Actually, you don’t need a full fledged CMS for a personal website. A CMS is the abbreviation of a content management system and is a website that’s built around a database and forms to add content to the website. This means a lot of code that can be abused by not so friendly visitors.

item.title: Welcome to John's two cents
item.description: Hi, After some years of absence in the blog-o-sphere, I decided to start writing again. After running a successfull blog for quite some time I was ready to take some time off as running the blog was too time-consuming. I had the joy back then to organize Blogosphere, a meetup for Belgian bloggers, work with PR agencies and attend different press events. I guess I did all what I wanted to achieve back in the day.
